name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Ruby Engineer with 8 years of experience, I bring a deep expertise in **Ruby**, **Ruby on Rails**, **SQL**, and **PostgreSQL**, along with a strong foundation in **Docker**, **Terraform**, and **Kubernetes** for containerization and orchestration. My proficiency in building robust APIs and applying Test-Driven Development practices ensures the delivery of high-quality software aligned with best practices in **cybersecurity**. I have successfully led projects focusing on the integration of open-source technologies and have implemented CI/CD workflows using tools like **Capistrano**. 
In addition to my core Ruby expertise, I possess a diverse tech stack encompassing **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**. My background includes developing high-performance applications in the healthcare and financial sectors, coupled with cloud experience in **Azure** and **AWS**. I have also led the development of enterprise-grade platforms that integrate AI/ML capabilities for predictive analytics, intelligent automation, and real-time data processing. With a robust understanding of microservices architecture and event-driven systems, I am committed to delivering secure applications that meet compliance standards like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2.
